name: LibraryContentProvider
desc: A source of Xcode library and code completion content.

items.name: var views: [LibraryItem]
items.desc: The SwiftUI views that you want to add to the Xcode library.

items.name: func modifiers(base: Self.ModifierBase) -> [LibraryItem]
items.desc: Indicates a collection of SwiftUI view modifiers to add to the Xcode library.

items.name: associatedtype ModifierBase = Any
items.desc: A type to use as a base for modifier completions.

items.name: struct LibraryContentBuilder
items.desc: A function builder for generating arrays of library items without requiring full array literal syntax.
